# Republican Institute for Vocational Education

The Republican Institute for Vocational Education (, RIPA or RIPO, ) is a higher education institution in Minsk, Belarus. Founded in December 1992, it is managed by the Ministry of Education of the Republic of Belarus.
Structure
More than 200 employees work in this institute.
* 3 science-methodological centres
* 8 departments in the Faculty of Improvement of Skills
* centre for economic education, created with support of Germany.
External links
*[http://ripo.unibel.by/ RIPO website]
